_source.short_desc: Hybrent medical purchasing, inventory management and invoicing software integrates with most AP and clinical applications.
_source.long_desc: Hybrent is a cloud-based ordering and inventory management system with barcoding to increase profitability, lower costs and provide cost-effective, quality patient care. Gain visibility into supply spend and use while streamlining workflows through integrating with your EMR/AP systems. Effortlessly manage your implants with Bill and Replace! Automate 3-way match, track supplies by serial #, accurate case costing, cycle counts, and gain insights to reduce spend and waste with robust reporting.
_source.target_audience: Non-acute care providers who are seeking a more efficient procure-to-pay solution. We have a range of successful customers including PO, ASC, Post Acute Care (LTC/SNF), IDN, and hospital systems.

category_features.name: Barcode / Ticket Scanning
category_features.definition: The ability to scan barcodes to ensure accurate pricing and label tracking

category_features.name: Purchasing & Receiving
category_features.definition: Buy necessary items in compliance with established business policies

category_features.name: 1099 Preparation
category_features.definition: Create and distribute 1099 tax forms to suppliers

category_features.name: Aging Tracking
category_features.definition: Pull a report on unpaid invoices that shows how much time has elapsed since the date of the invoice

category_features.name: Approval Process Control
category_features.definition: Streamline and manage the process of granting permission to the correct parties throughout task progression

category_features.name: Cash Management
category_features.definition: Collection, handling, management and usage of an organization's funds

category_features.name: Check Writing
category_features.definition: Issue payments to third parties via checks

category_features.name: Data Extraction
category_features.definition: Automatically extract information from documents or websites and input it into a database in a specified format

category_features.name: Duplicate Payment Alert
category_features.definition: Receive an automatic notification when the same exact payment is about to be initiated for the second time

category_features.name: Electronic Funds Transfer
category_features.definition: Transfer money electronically between two bank accounts

category_features.name: Fraud Detection
category_features.definition: Identify and prevent suspicious activity

category_features.name: Invoice Processing
category_features.definition: Create, process, execute and manage suppliers invoices till the payment is made

category_features.name: PO Reconciliation
category_features.definition: Verify that invoices comply to the terms of pre-issued purchase orders prior to issuing payments

category_features.name: Recurring Payments
category_features.definition: Automate supplier payments on a predetermined schedule (monthly, quarterly, etc)

category_features.name: Vendor Management
category_features.definition: Ability to track and store all vendor-related information, such as contacts, services offered, terms, etc.

category_features.definition: Identify and track items using barcode tags or RFID (radio-frequency identification) tags that contain electronically-stored data

category_features.name: Check-in/Check-out

category_features.definition: Record and monitor cost related information of assets (i.e. budget for assets, equipment costs, revenues, etc.)

related_products.short_desc: Medical inventory software for the healthcare industry. Scan items in bulk, track POs, and create custom alerts. Free 15 day trial!
related_products.features: Our leading medical asset management software enables you to track consumables, manage asset reservations, schedule services, and do bulk scans for quick processing. Our fully-integrated mobile app makes it easy to update data on the go. Full maintenance histories and actionable reports make this a must have for all your healthcare asset management needs. RFID, Barcode and QR Code scanning functionality. Start 15 day free trial today to see seamless asset tracking in action!

related_products.short_desc: Take control over your medical inventory management and eliminate manual processes so you can focus on growing your business.
related_products.features: Experience groundbreaking automation of your medical inventory management. Fishbowl's fully-supported medical software is geared for manufacturers efficiently managing cost and profits. Whether it's a small independent or large pharmaceutical company, Fishbowl offers a complete manufacturing and inventory management solution. Automate work orders and material requirements planning (MRP), bills of materials, barcode scanning and more to reduce costs and maximize profitability.

related_products.short_desc: The secret powering small businesses in 90+ countries worldwide. Track stock, manage sales, pick and ship orders, and more,
related_products.features:
inFlow Inventory is the easiest way to run your wholesale, distribution, manufacturing, or ecommerce business.

Track stock across any location and manage purchases and sales-all from one app.

inFlow helps you manage any order or process from start to finish, with full pick/pack/ship support, BOM and assemblies, and connections to over 35 different ecommerce platforms.

We offer in-house support via live chat, email, and callback.

Click Visit Website to start your free 14-day trial now.

related_products.short_desc: A real-time inventory management and high-volume order fulfillment add-on solution for growth-focused businesses using QuickBooks.
related_products.features:
Built for growing product-selling businesses using QuickBooks , Acctivate is a premium inventory management & multi-channel order fulfillment add-on that helps you focus on growth without operational limitations.

Solve for QuickBooks limitations, including real-time inventory visibility, multi-warehousing, multi-channel orders, ecommerce fulfillment, EDI transaction support, barcoding, landed cost, lot and serial number traceability and more.

related_products.short_desc: The industry's simplest (mobile friendly) Inventory and asset tracking system. Trusted by 1000's of businesses. Get it for free today.
related_products.features:
Sortly is a super simple medical inventory and asset tracking system to visually track your medical supplies or equipment and any of their details including location, price, quantity etc for a more intuitive (and less maddening) way to track your items.

Key Features: 
- Access on any Mobile, tablet or computer
- Create/connect any barcodes or QR labels
- Check in/out scanner
- Customizable
- Track user activity

Trusted by 1000's of businesses. Create a free account today.

related_products.short_desc: eTurns TrackStock inventory replenishment app replenishes and tracks medical supplies using phones, RFID, sensors. Optimizes inventory
related_products.features: eTurns TrackStock is an automated inventory replenishment app for medical supplies in clinics, hospital stockrooms and EMS trucks. Get visibility into on-hand inventory. Requisition items for future surgeries. Use IOS/Android, RFID or SensorBins to reorder, manage and optimize inventories. Decrease inventory costs up to 75%. 10x faster than manual ordering and e-commerce. Free 30 day trial. Pays for itself in 1-2 mo.  Integrates with Quickbooks and many ERP/WMS.

related_products.short_desc: Intelligent Medical Software (IMS) by Meditab, is an award-winning, all-in-one EHR, practice management, and billing platform.
related_products.features: IMS caters to every step of the patient care delivery process, from patient engagement to telehealth, practice analytics, automated check-in, care coordination, reporting, and more. Its multi-specialty features, modules, and templates were built from the ground up to adapt to the exact needs of over 40 specialties.

related_products.short_desc: Medical Purchasing and Inventory software that automates your process in a purely paperless mode. Proven at 50+ healthcare providers.
related_products.features: Rated #1 for ease of use for medical purchasing control and inventory management for healthcare providers who create 50- 1000 PO's a month.  Money Back Guarantee.  See why we are rated #1. Designed for tracking medical inventory with barcode scanning of lots, expiration dates, patient use, etc,, along with purchasing, and invoice payment. Preference Cards and Kits. Quickbooks compatible.  20+ PunchOuts to major healthcare suppliers.

related_products.short_desc: Reduce unnecessary spending by monitoring inventory levels, receiving stock alerts, easily managing budgets and staying compliant.
related_products.features: Sowingo is a cloud-based platform that links inventory management and e-commerce for dental and medical practices. We inform dental professionals the best time to purchase supplies for their practices based on when supply quantities are running low, when expiry dates are approaching and the products they use are on sale. In the end Sowingo is helping reduce waste, making practices more efficient all the while helping reduce health care costs.

related_products.short_desc: Assets, Manufacturing, Distribution, Supply Chain, Fleet Maintenance, Custom Applications, Work Orders(BOM,Kitting), Inventory Mgmt,
related_products.features: Flowtrac is a cloud-based or on-premise solution that helps organizations manage their Inventory, Assets, Warehouse, Work In Process, Proof of Delivery, and other Special requirements. Clients include Commercial, Government, Education, and Humanitarian organizations. Users access the system via desktops, tablets, smartphones, or mobile barcode guns. Flowtrac staff guides you from start to finish with training, consulting, and development. Service and support offered online or on-site.

similar_products.short_desc: Use your iPhone or Android to scan medical inventory across multiple sites and locations.  100% web-based means nothing to install.
similar_products.features: 100% focused on healthcare supply chain, SurgiCare's cloud-based solution means no complex installations and no servers to maintain.   Scan items on your iPhone, iPad and Android devices, perform case-costing, track expiration dates and lot numbers, integrated purchasing with major suppliers, invoicing, forecasting, surgical preference cards, and more.  Pay-as-you-grow subscription means we accommodate smaller centers (and budgets) to larger hospital facilities.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one inventory management software that helps medical practices track items and streamlines the inventory management workflow.
similar_products.features: ArbiMed Inventory is an all-in-one inventory management software that helps medical practices track, monitor, and analyze the usage of medical items. It supports purchase order management, multi-location, and point of sale, and more. Advanced barcoding technology enables quick scan-in and scan-out. Integrated with industry-leading PMS, EHR, and supplier systems to help increase practice efficiencies and streamline the operational workflows. Get in touch with us to get a Free Demo!

similar_products.short_desc: Envi is a complete procure-to-pay software that gives control, automation and visibility into the full range of your supply chain.
similar_products.features: Envi software uncovers savings through a customized formulary built from your GPO and local contracts. We have procurement experts and analysts ready to help automate your inventory management and purchasing operations. Our advanced analytics decode your supply, financial and operational data to make new discoveries that cut costs. With Envi you gain unprecedented control, automation and visibility into the full range of your supply chain. Envi is Healthcare's Smarter Supply Chain.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Chiropractic software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Chiropractic tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Chiropractic software automates practice management, billing, scheduling, patient care and reporting for chiropractic offices. Chiropractic offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of chiropractic SOAP notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, chiropractic practice management, electronic claims, collections and financial reporting. Chiropractic software is related to other Capterra directories like: Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Physical Therapy software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Dental software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Dental tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Dental software manages dental practice operations including billing, accounting, and scheduling. Dental offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Dental office software also typically offers a variety of data tools such as periodontal charting and three dimensional rendering or other visualization tools. Dental software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospital Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospital Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Inventory Control software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Inventory Control tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Inventory Control software automates the management and tracking of goods and often includes tools such as bar code software. These programs enable increased inventory accuracy and up-to-date sales tracking by distributing sales and supply data throughout an organization. Inventory control systems interact directly with pre-existing or custom installed retail management, point of sale (POS), and accounting tools. Inventory Control software is related to Inventory Management software and RFID software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Inventory Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Inventory Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Inventory Management software monitors inventory levels for optimal production and distribution of goods for wholesale or retail. These applications enable organizations to efficiently manage inventory as well as procurement and order fulfillment functions. Inventory Management solutions ensure accurate real-time inventory reporting and the ability to distribute this essential data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Inventory Management software is related to Inventory Control software and Supply Chain Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Optometry software is designed to manage optometry practices. Optometry software is related to Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software, and Electronic Medical Records software.

_source.short_desc: Hybrent medical purchasing, inventory management and invoicing software integrates with most AP and clinical applications.
_source.long_desc: Healthcare supply chain software created to bring a low cost, cloud-based purchasing and inventory management system to ASCs, Physician Clinics, and Long-term Care Centers. Hybrent's software is a healthcare center's supply chain solution for e-procurement, approvals, order tracking & confirmations, invoice matching, AP and PMS integrations, reporting, preference cards, and more. Save time and money with Hybrent's easy-to-use portal for transactions with all vendors. Request a FREE demo today!
_source.target_audience: Non-acute care providers who are seeking a more efficient procure-to-pay solution. We have a range of successful customers including PO, ASC, Post Acute Care (LTC/SNF), IDN, and hospital systems.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Commerce enables you to manage inventory and orders for your multichannel business and keep track of products.
related_products.features:
QuickBooks Commerce enables you to manage inventory and orders for your multichannel business and keep track of your products as you sell and restock across multiple warehouse locations and channels. 

QuickBooks Commerce allows brands to automate and integrate their commerce platforms and get powerful insights into all their sales data on-demand.

related_products.short_desc: Simple, easy-to-use accounting software to help you manage your business finance in a smart way!
related_products.features: Use Zoho Books to create and send detailed and customized purchase orders with your own branding. Track opened purchase orders and convert POs to bills.

related_products.short_desc: 360+ 4.7/5 reviews. Simple yet, fully featured. The highest rated purchasing software.
related_products.features: Simple Purchasing software that allows team members to create purchase requests on the go that can get approved by pre-defined approvers - from any device. All relevant comments & docs can get attached to the PO & managed for reporting & auditing. Eliminate spending mistakes & keep team members accountable for company card purchasing. View and manage budgets in real-time for insightful decision-making for each purchase. Draw accurate reports with a click of a button for the accountant.

related_products.short_desc: Automate and integrate your processes to gain full control and visibility of your purchasing process with Pipefy.
related_products.features:
Gain full control and visibility of your purchasing process with Pipefy.

The process management platform helps you ensure requisitions and purchase orders are being processed quickly and accurately, and allows you to integrate your accounting software or other legacy tools to scale your operation. 

Build an error-proof operation with digital workflows that reduce the risk of human error. Try Pipefy for free.

related_products.short_desc: Cin7 Orderhive is the ultimate automated eCommerce order management, and inventory management software for retailers and wholesalers.
related_products.features: Cin7 Orderhive is order, shipping, and inventory management software for online retailers and marketplace sellers. Automate, track, and manage your orders from the 16 most popular marketplaces, and 9 most popular online stores like Shopify, WooCommerce, etc. Easily set automation rules to efficiently process 10 to 1000s of orders per day including automated, integrated shipping, fulfillment, 3PLs, and drop shipping.

related_products.short_desc: Spendwise is an affordable easy-to-use online system that helps you control spending saving you time and money.
related_products.features: Spendwise is an affordable easy-to-use online system that helps you control spending saving you time and money.  Users can create purchase orders, submit them for approval, approve or reject them, and send them directly to vendors.  Users can also keep track of items and bills received from vendors.  Spendwise is web-based so you don't have to install software and you can access it from anywhere.  Visit our website for more information and sign up for a Free Trial and/or Demo!

related_products.short_desc: Centralize and control purchasing process. Structured approvals, Amazon Punch-in, budgeting, unified items catalogs, and more.
related_products.features: Manage purchasing process and access real-time reports. related_products.short_desc: Deploy personalized procure-to-pay workflows that empower your teams to purchase what they need, when they need it.

The Procurify Platform brings all your purchasing needs together in one easy-to-use platform that fully integrates with your existing accounting systems. Maximize operational efficiency and increase spend visibility and control with comprehensive procure-to-pay workflows, 3-way matching, and custom approvals.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline and secure your company's purchasing process with multi-tier approval and automated 3-way line item matching.
related_products.features: Lightyear's class-leading platform brings purchasing visibility to your business from computer, tablet or mobile. Control who can order what, increase the speed of approvals, bring spending under control & reduce the potential for fraud with our Purchase Order (PO) workflow and approvals matrix. Automate and streamline bill to PO matching with automated 3-way matching at a line-item level.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based tool that helps businesses manage order fulfillment & inventory processes across online sales channels.
related_products.features:
Ecomdash is an inventory management and order fulfillment software company that gives you the option of managing all your online sales channels from one dashboard. Coordinate sales and stock levels on platforms such as eBay, Amazon, Etsy, and more with reporting and auto-synchronizing. 

The software is ideal for small to medium sized companies and comes with a free 15-day trial and free onboarding session for new, active users. All ecomdash customers also receive a free Pitney Bowes account.

related_products.short_desc: Open source solution for all around business management from customers and orders to invoicing and inventory.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Procurement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Procurement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Procurement software automates the purchasing process and manages all activities related to an organization's expenditures. Procurement applications automate the process of resource acquisition and supplier relationship management. Employees can easily create purchase orders subject to review and approval by managers. Managers have a broad range tools at their disposal for tracking, analysis and reporting on business process efficiency. Procurement software is related to Billing and Invoicing software, Purchasing software and Vendor Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Spend Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Spend Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Spend Management software helps companies track and report on actual expenditures as well as control these expenditures through tools that limit amounts that can be spent by employees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Vendor Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Vendor Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Vendor Management software helps manage costs, track progress, and report on relationship and product quality of third-party vendors. When an organization uses multiple vendors, Vendor Management software can enhance productivity and collaboration of the vendor projects. This type of software often includes information databasing, vendor scoring, RFP and bidding functionality, and performance tracking. Vendor Management software is related to Contract Management software, Proposal Management software, Procurement software, and Purchasing software.
